title: Characterization of atmospheric microplastics in Hangzhou, a Megacity of the Yangtze River Delta, China
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Liang Xu, Jiefeng Li, Shushen Yang, Zhenyang Li, Yan Liu, Yifan Zhao, Dantong Liu, Admir Creso Targino, Zhonghua Zheng, Mingzhou Yu, Peng Xu, Yele Sun, Weijun Li
Microplastics (MPs) have become a key environmental issue over the last few decades. However, while previous studies have mainly focused on aquatic MPs pollution, research on atmospheric MPs remains limited....
